description:
Sundry is a WinGet local manifest management tool that makes it easier for you to remove manifests, make changes to them, and also aids in updating them.


新功能
- feat: cat 清单时给出清单绝对路径 by @DuckDuckStudio
修复
- fix: 修复在原先没有配置文件时，Sundry 不会自行创建的问题 (#10) by @DuckDuckStudio , 感谢 @fjwxzde 报告此问题！
- fix: 修复在配置为不对提交进行签名时无法运行命令的问题 (#9) by @DuckDuckStudio , 感谢 @fjwxzde 报告此问题！
完整修改记录: https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Sundry/compare/1.1.10...1.1.11
